Title: Expands which individuals qualify to be an individual's personal assistant for the purposes of consumer directed personal assistance programs
Summary: Expands which individuals qualify to be an individual's personal assistant for the purposes of consumer directed personal assistance programs to include an eligible individual's attorney-in-fact, health care proxy, or legal guardian.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-f, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to expanding which individuals qualify to be an individual's personal assistant for the purposes of consumer directed personal assistance programs
